Class lesserHeals

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item
      • lesserHeals

  • public class lesserHeals
extends Item
    Date: May 5th 2018 This class creates the Lesser Heal Tickets Item, lesserHeals. Parent Class is Item. Attributes include amount of HealBase, Duration and description. Enables Hero to use Lesser Heal Tickets Item.
    Author:
    Sachin Sakthivel and Sasiru Goonatillake

    • Constructor Detail

      • lesserHeals

        public lesserHeals​()
        Constructor method for Item, lesserHeals. Sets Name, Price and Stock using Item Class. Health restored, HealBase, is set to 10. Duration is set to 1 mins. An explanation of how the Item, Greater Heal Tickets work is stored in Description.

    • Method Detail

      • getHealNum

        public int getHealNum​()
        This method returns an Integer variable 'getHealNum' meaning amount of health restored to Hero.
        Returns:
        Returns Integer getHealNum.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString​()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • use

        public java.lang.String use​(Hero hero)
        This method lets user use 'lesserHeals' item on Hero. Checks if Item is available in Team Inventory, if present restores 10 to 13 Health (randomized) over 1 minutes of Hero. Else alerts the user to the lack of the Item.
        Overrides:
        use in class Item
        Parameters:
        hero - Hero Object variable referencing Hero to which the Item will be used on.
        Returns:
        Returns String variable "Not Working".
